import React from 'react' import Product from '../components/Product' import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import data from '../data'; function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.find((x) => x.id === props.match.params.id); if (!product) { return
Product Not Found
} return (

  • {product.name}

  • Price : RSD{product.price}
  • Price
    RSD{product.price}
) } export default ProductScreen
